scripts.run: ncc build src/main.ts && node dist/index.js --projectDir ./sample --solutionFileName sample.sln --excludeProjects *Test.csproj --allowedLicenses Apache-2.0;MIT;BSD-3-Clause;MS-PL --exportDir .
scripts.run-invalid: ncc build src/main.ts && node dist/index.js --projectDir ./sample --solutionFileName sample.sln --excludeProjects *Test.csproj --allowedLicenses NONE
